title: Frontend Developer
description:
**Job Title: Frontend Developer (ReactJS \\+ .NET Developer)** 




**Experience: 5\\+ Years** 




**Location: Hybrid (Open across all locations ‚Äì Noida, Pune, Bangalore, Chennai, Hyderabad, Gurgaon, Indore)** 




**Work Hours: 11:00 AM ‚Äì 9:00 PM IST** 




  





**Job Overview:** 




 We are seeking a highly skilled Frontend Developer with strong expertise in ReactJS and moderate proficiency in .NET to join our dynamic development team. The ideal candidate will have a solid background in building responsive, scalable, and high\\-performing web applications with a focus on modern UI/UX principles and API integrations.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 




 ‚Ä¢ Design, develop, and maintain dynamic web applications using ReactJS and .NET.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Collaborate with backend developers to integrate APIs and ensure seamless front\\-to\\-back functionality.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Optimize application performance for maximum speed and scalability.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Implement responsive design and cross\\-browser compatibility.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Participate in code reviews, debugging, and troubleshooting.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Work closely with UI/UX designers to translate wireframes into functional web interfaces.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Contribute to system design discussions and suggest improvements to enhance user experience.
 



  





**Required Skills \\& Qualifications:** 




 ‚Ä¢ 5\\+ years of professional experience in frontend development.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Strong expertise in ReactJS (Hooks, Context API, Redux, React Router, etc.).
 



 ‚Ä¢ Good understanding of .NET Framework / .NET Core (C\\#, Web APIs).
 



 ‚Ä¢ Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6\\+), and TypeScript.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Experience with RESTful APIs and asynchronous request handling.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Familiarity with version control tools (Git) and CI/CD pipelines.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Strong problem\\-solving skills and ability to work in a collaborative environment.
 



  





**Good to Have:** 




 ‚Ä¢ Experience with Azure or AWS Cloud services.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Knowledge of SQL Server or database integration.
 



 ‚Ä¢ Exposure to Agile/Scrum methodologies.
 


* ‚Ä¢ Understanding of containerization (Docker/Kubernetes) is a plus.

title: Engineer
description:
**Company Description**

 GenesisCipher Labs is an innovative FinTech infrastructure startup focused on developing secure blockchain protocols. These include stablecoins, oracles, and payment systems designed to promote financial transparency, decentralization, and accessibility. The company strives to revolutionize the financial landscape by building technologies that empower individuals and enhance trust in financial systems. By leveraging blockchain, GenesisCipher Labs is committed to shaping the future of decentralized finance.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a remote contract role for an Engineer. The Engineer will design, develop, and implement blockchain protocols and secure financial systems. Responsibilities include coding, testing, and maintaining high\\-performance and scalable software solutions. The role also involves collaborating with cross\\-functional teams, troubleshooting technical issues, optimizing applications, and ensuring compliance with security standards.
   




**Qualifications**
* Strong programming skills in languages such as Python, Java, C\\+\\+, or Rust
* Experience with blockchain development, including smart contracts, decentralized applications (DApps), and understanding of consensus algorithms
* Proficiency in database technologies and cloud platforms
* Solid foundation in algorithms, data structures, and software architecture
* Create and maintain system design documentation effectively
* Ability to work independently and deliver results in a remote, collaborative, fast\\-paced environment
* Knowledge of cryptography, security protocols, or FinTech systems is a strong advantage
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree or higher in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field

title: Fullstack Developer- MERN Developer
description:
* Medical benefits included
* PF and Gratuity included


**About Our Client**
 The hiring company is a well\\-established name in the insurance brokerage industry. As a large organization, they are focused on building innovative technology solutions that enhance customer experiences and streamline insurance services.
   

  

**Job Description**
* Design, develop, and maintain scalable web applications using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js).
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to define project requirements and deliverables.
* Develop and optimize APIs and server\\-side logic for seamless integration.
* Ensure the responsiveness and performance of applications across multiple devices and platforms.
* Conduct thorough testing and debugging to ensure high\\-quality code.
* Maintain and upgrade existing applications to enhance functionality and performance.
* Utilize best practices in coding and development processes to ensure security and efficiency.
* Stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in the insurance and technology sectors.


**The Successful Applicant**
 Fullstack Developer (1\\-2 Years Experience)
   

  

 Role Overview:
   

  

 We are looking for a Fullstack Developer with hands\\-on experience in both frontend and backend development. The ideal candidate should be proficient in React/Redux, Node.js, and databases (MongoDB/MySQL), with exposure to API integrations and performance optimization.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities:
   

  

 Design, develop, and maintain fullstack web applications.
   

  

 Implement responsive user interfaces using React/Redux, HTML, and CSS.
   

  

 Develop backend services and RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express.
   

  

 Work with databases (MongoDB/MySQL) to design schemas and optimize queries.
   

  

 Integrate third\\-party APIs and internal services.
   

  

 Ensure scalability, performance, and security across the stack.
   

  

 Collaborate with designers, frontend, and backend teams to deliver end\\-to\\-end solutions.
   

  

 Requirements:
   

  

 Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
   

  

 1\\-2 years of experience as a fullstack developer.
   

  

 Proficiency in React, Redux, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript (ES6\\+).
   

  

 Strong backend experience with Node.js and Express.js.
   

  

 Database knowledge: MongoDB and MySQL.
   

  

 Experience with version control (Git) and API integrations.
   

  

 Understanding of caching strategies (Redis, Memcached) is a plus.
   

  

 Good problem\\-solving skills and attention to detail.
   

  

- 

**What's on Offer**
* Competitive salary
* Opportunity to work with a reputed company in the insurance brokerage industry.
* Engaging and innovative work environment in Gurugram.
* Chance to work with cutting\\-edge technology and grow your skillset.


 If you are passionate about technology and want to make an impact in the insurance industry, we encourage you to apply today!
   

  

**Contact: Anwesha Banerjee**

title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
**Position:** 
 Full Stack Developer
 



**Location:** 
 Remote
 



  





**Mandatory Skills:** 



* .Net (Core / MVC)
* React.js
* AWS (EC2, Lambda, S3, RDS, DynamoDB, etc.)



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Design, develop, and maintain backend services using .Net Core/MVC and frontend components using React.js.
* Build and scale backend systems on AWS cloud infrastructure using services like EC2, Lambda, S3, RDS, DynamoDB, etc.
* Collaborate closely with frontend developers to ensure seamless integration across the stack.
* Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code that adheres to best practices and coding standards.
* Debug, optimize, and troubleshoot backend issues to ensure optimal performance and reliability.
* Manage AWS services with a focus on uptime, scalability, cost\\-efficiency, and security.
* Conduct code reviews and provide technical mentorship to junior developers.
* Participate in setting up and maintaining CI/CD pipelines.
* Stay updated on current trends and best practices in full stack development and cloud computing.



  





**Required Skills \\& Qualifications:** 



* 6\\+ years of experience in backend development using .Net (.Net Core / MVC).
* Minimum 2 years of hands\\-on experience with React.js.
* At least 1 year of experience with AWS cloud services.
* Strong experience building and maintaining RESTful APIs and working with microservices architecture.
* Proficiency with AWS SDKs, CLI tools, and cloud resource management.
* Understanding of cloud security best practices.
* Familiarity with containerization technologies (e.g., Docker) and orchestration tools (e.g., Kubernetes).
* Proficient with Git and working in Agile environments.
* Solid understanding of both SQL and NoSQL databases.
* Ability to work independently in a remote team environment.



  





**Preferred Qualifications:** 



* AWS Certifications (e.g., AWS Certified Developer, Solutions Architect).
* Experience with monitoring and logging tools (e.g., CloudWatch, ELK stack).
* Exposure to serverless computing and event\\-driven architecture.
* Familiarity with Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools such as Terraform or CloudFormation.
* Experience with DevOps practices and tools, including CI/CD pipelines.

title: Java Support Engineer
job_function: Information Technology, Consulting, and Customer Service
description:
**Job Title:** 
 L3 Support Engineer
 



**Location:** 
 Remote
 



  





**Job Summary:** 




 We are looking for a Level 3 Support Engineer to join our Xray Data Center (DC) team supporting Atlassian\\-based enterprise products. You will act as the escalation point for complex customer issues, working closely with developers and QA engineers to analyze, troubleshoot, and resolve critical production incidents. This role requires strong experience with Java, Atlassian Plugin Framework, and enterprise support practices.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Handle complex issues escalated from Level 1 and Level 2 support teams for Xray DC.
* Investigate root causes by reproducing, debugging, and analyzing application and server logs.
* Collaborate with the development team to provide long\\-term fixes and product improvements.
* Troubleshoot issues related to Atlassian applications (Jira/Confluence) in Server/DC environments.
* Manage patch releases and coordinate with QA to validate fixes.
* Support customer deployments, upgrades, and integrations.
* Maintain detailed technical documentation and contribute to the internal knowledge base.
* Participate in incident reviews to improve reliability and customer experience.



  





**Required Skills \\& Experience:** 



* 4‚Äì7 years of experience in enterprise software support or application support.
* Strong hands\\-on experience in Java 11\\+, Spring, and REST APIs.
* Familiarity with Atlassian SDK, Atlassian Plugin Framework, and Active Objects.
* Experience with Maven, Git/Bitbucket, and Bamboo/Jenkins pipelines.
* Proficiency in Linux environments, bash scripting, and log analysis (Log4j2, Tomcat, etc.).
* Working knowledge of SQL and database performance debugging.
* Understanding of thread safety, clustering, and Data Center scalability concepts.
* Excellent debugging and communication skills to work effectively with global teams.



  





**Nice to Have:** 



* Exposure to Xray for Jira or other Atlassian Marketplace apps.
* Familiarity with Lucene or OpenSearch.
* Prior experience in L3/Developer Support for enterprise Java products.

title: Senior Software Development Engineer in Test
description:
Construction is the 2nd largest industry in the world (4x the size of SaaS!). But unlike software (with observability platforms such as AppDynamics and Datadog), construction teams lack automated feedback loops to help projects stay on schedule and on budget. Without this observability, construction wastes a whopping $3T per year because glitches aren‚Äôt detected fast enough to recover.
   

  

 Doxel AI exists to bring computer vision to construction, so the industry can deliver what society needs to thrive. From hospitals to data centers, from foreman to VPs of construction, teams use Doxel to make better decisions everyday. In fact, Doxel has contributed to the construction of the facilities that provide many of the products and services you use everyday.
   

  

 We have LLM\\-driven automation, classic computer vision, deep learning ML object detection, a low\\-latency 3D three.js web app, and a complex data pipeline powering it all in the background. We‚Äôre building out new workflows, analytics dashboards, and forecasting engines. Join us in bringing AI to construction!
   

  

 We're at an exciting stage of scale as we build upon our growing market momentum. Our software is trusted by Shell Oil, Genentech, HCA healthcare, Kaiser, Turner, Layton and several others. Join us in bringing AI to construction!
   

  

**The Role**
 A Senior SDET with Doxel is driving quality in next\\-generation, local\\-first web applications. You'll be leading test automation efforts across real\\-time and batch data processing and interactive frontends to ensure reliability and performance. If you're passionate about shift\\-left testing, automation, and embedding rigorous validation at every stage, this role is for you.
   

  

 You will define and implement Doxel‚Äôs test automation strategy, ensuring scalability and reliability across frontend, backend, and data pipelines. Your expertise in CI/CD integration, performance testing, and security validation will enable seamless execution of AI\\-driven analytics, 360\\-degree video processing, and massive dataset handling. Your work will empower construction teams with precise, real\\-time decision\\-making tools.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 You are obsessed with preventing issues before they arise, ensuring robust automation and infrastructure. You excel in complex systems, balancing client\\-side computation, real\\-time data, and backend integrations. You champion developer autonomy, mentor engineers, and build automation frameworks that enhance velocity without sacrificing reliability.
   

  

**What You'll Do**
* Own and scale test automation across frontend, backend, and data pipelines to support fast, reliable releases
* Develop UI and API test suites that push the limits of performance using Three.js, DuckDb, and WebAssembly
* Streamline CI/CD, integrating automated regression, load, and chaos testing for dependable deployments
* Create and refine greenfield regression suites that evolve with the product
* Embed automation early, ensuring testing accelerates development instead of slowing it down
* Guide and support engineers in building a strong testing culture with practical, scalable best practices


**What You Bring To Doxel**
* 4\\+ years in test automation frameworks (Playwright, Cypress, Selenium, PyTest, Jest, JUnit)
* 6\\+ years of hands\\-on coding in TypeScript, Python, or Java, building and extending test frameworks
* Experience testing high\\-performance frontend applications (WebGL/Three.js, WebAssembly, client\\-side databases)
* Strong backend API testing skills, including database validation and large\\-scale data pipeline testing
* Proficiency in CI/CD (GitHub Actions, CircleCI, Buildkite) and infrastructure\\-as\\-code testing
* Knowledge of performance testing tools (k6, Locust, JMeter) and security best practices
* Passion for developer productivity, reducing MTTD/MTTR
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science or related technical field


 Pay is based on factors such as location, skill level, qualifications, competencies, and overall experience. Options may be included as an additional part of the package.
   

  

 Doxel also provides comprehensive health/dental/vision benefits for employees and their families, an Unlimited PTO policy, a 401(k) program, and a flexible work environment among other benefits.
   

  

 Doxel is an equal opportunity employer and actively seeks diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.
   

  

 Join us in revolutionizing construction technology‚Äîwhere every line of code directly impacts real\\-world projects.
   

  

 We may use artificial intelligence (AI) tools to support parts of the hiring process, such as reviewing applications, analyzing resumes, or assessing responses. These tools assist our recruitment team but do not replace human judgment. Final hiring decisions are ultimately made by humans. If you would like more information about how your data is processed, please contact us.

title: AWS PSDE III ( Require only immediate joiners )
description:
**Key Responsibilities**
* Automate deployments utilizing custom templates and modules for customer environments on AWS.
* Architect AWS environment best practices and deployment methodologies
* Create automation tools and processes to improve day to day functions
* Educate customers on AWS and Rackspace best practices and architecture.
* Ensure the control, integrity, and accessibility of the cloud environment for the enterprise Lead Workload/Workforce Management and Optimization related tasks
* Mentor and assist Rackers across the Cloud Function
* Quality check development of technical training for all Rackers supporting Rackspace Supported CLOUD Products
* Provide technical expertise underpinning communications targeting a range of stakeholders \\- from individual contributors to leaders across the business
* Collaborate with Account Managers and Business Development Consultants to build strong customer relationships.


**Technical Expertise**
* Experienced in solutioning and implementation of Green field projects leveraging IaaS, PaaS for Primary site and DR
* Near expert knowledge of AWS Products \\& Services, Compute, Storage, Security, networking, etc
* Proficient skills in at least one of the following languages: Python, Linux, Shell scripting
* Proficient skills with git and git workflows
* Excellent working knowledge of Windows or Linux operating systems ‚Äì experience of supporting and troubleshooting issues and performance
* Highly skilled in Terraform/IaC, including CI/CD practices
* Working knowledge in Kubernetes
* Experience in designing, building, implementing, analysing, Migrating and troubleshooting highly available systems
* Knowledge of at least one configuration management system such as Chef, Ansible, Puppet or any other such tools
* Understanding of services and protocols, configuration, management, and troubleshooting of hosting environments, including web servers, databases, caching, and database services
* Knowledge in the application of current and emerging network software and hardware technology and protocols.


**Skills**
* Passionate about technology and has a desire to constantly expand technical knowledge
* Detail\\-oriented in documenting information and able to own customer issues through resolution
* Able to handle multiple tasks and prioritize work under pressure
* Demonstrate sound problem\\-solving skills coupled with a desire to take on responsibility
* Strong written and verbal communication skills, both highly technical and non\\-technical.
* Ability to communicate technical issues to nontechnical and technical audiences.


**Education**
* Required Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science or equivalent degree


**Certifications**
* Requires Associate level Certificates in AWS or professional level certificate


**Experience**
* 7\\+ Years of total IT experience

title: Gen AI Developer
description:
**Sr Gen AI Developer** 




**Exp\\- 7 yrs** 




**Location\\- Remote** 




  





**Essential Qualifications:** 



* Advanced degree (Master‚Äôs or higher) in Computer Science, Engineering, or a closely related technical discipline.
* Minimum of 3 years of hands\\-on experience with a range of machine learning models, spanning traditional to advanced methods.
* Solid foundation in NLP methods, including applications like text classification, sentiment detection, and entity recognition.
* Proficiency with Retrieval\\-Augmented Generation (RAG) techniques and experience working with vector databases (e.g., Weaviate, PineCone).
* Extensive Python programming skills, with a proven ability to implement complex solutions.
* At least 1 year of practical experience in building applications based on Large Language Models (LLMs) using established third\\-party models (e.g., OpenAI, Anthropic).
* Skilled in prompt engineering, with experience crafting function calls and constructing conversational AI applications.
* Familiarity with advanced LLM techniques such as zero\\-shot and few\\-shot learning, as well as fine\\-tuning for specific use cases.
* Strong background in using Generative AI libraries and tools, such as Langchain and HuggingFace.
* Solid grasp of version control practices, including Git and collaborative development workflows.
* Comprehensive experience in preparing, managing, and processing extensive datasets, both structured and unstructured.
* Proven experience deploying, scaling, and monitoring machine learning models, particularly LLMs, in live environments.‚Ä¢ Flexible to accommodate occasional overlap with US Eastern Time for effective team collaboration.
* Professional proficiency in English.Desirable



  





**Additional Experience:** 




 ‚Ä¢ Hands\\-on experience with open\\-source LLM frameworks, such as Llama or Mistral
 


* Prior work involving data in regulated sectors, such as healthcare, banking.



 Technical Skills and Capabilities:
 



 ‚Ä¢ Skilled in RESTful API design (Python\\-FastAPI) and development, ensuring secure and scalable interfaces.
 


* Proficient in JavaScript for both front\\-end and back\\-end, with a strong command of associated frameworks.
* Knowledgeable in architecting scalable solutions using microservices.
* Experience with the generative AI landscape, specifically around RAG, vector embeddings, LLMs, and open\\-source AI toolkits.‚Ä¢ Familiarity with cloud\\-based infrastructure (AWS, Azure, GCP) and their data services.
* Competent in database design and optimization across SQL and NoSQL technologies.
* Practical experience with data streaming platforms, such as Kafka, Azure Event Hub, or AWS Kinesis.
* Agile development experience, using tools like Git, Jenkins, and Azure DevOps.
* Skilled in creating and managing CI/CD pipelines for seamless testing and deployment.
* Excellent team collaboration and communication skills, with an aptitude for working across technical and non\\-technical roles.
